Create a quaternion from a rotation matrix.
 
QuaternionFromVectors(...)
Create a quaternion that acts as a rotation taking the e1,e2,e3 basis vectors to x,y,z.

Function Details

QuaternionFromEuler(...)

 

Construct a quaternion from an Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • angles - Sequence of 3 Euler angles.
  • order - The order to apply the Euler angle sequence.
  • inDegrees - True to indicate that angles are in degrees (default), or False for radians.
